SEARCH
Package vehicle

Interface ManualTransmission

All Known Implementing Classes:
RegularManualTransmission
public interface ManualTransmission
This interface represents a set of operations on any manual transmission. A manual transmission is a transmission that requires the driver to change gears as they are changing the speed.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ManualTransmission
    decreaseGear()
    Decrease the gear by one without changing speed and return the resulting transmission object.
    ManualTransmission
    decreaseSpeed()
    Decrease the speed by a fixed amount without changing gears and return the resulting transmission object.
    int
    getGear()
    Get the current gear of the vehicle as a whole number.
    int
    getSpeed()
    Get the current speed of the vehicle as a whole number.
    String
    getStatus()
    Return the status of this transmission as a String without any additional parameters.
    ManualTransmission
    increaseGear()
    Increase the gear by one without changing speed and return the resulting transmission object.
    ManualTransmission
    increaseSpeed()
    Increase the speed by a fixed amount without changing gears and return the resulting transmission object.

  • Method Details

    • getStatus

      String getStatus()
      Return the status of this transmission as a String without any additional parameters.
      Returns:
      the status of this transmission as a string.

    • getSpeed

      int getSpeed()
      Get the current speed of the vehicle as a whole number.
      Returns:
      the current speed of the vehicle.

    • getGear

      int getGear()
      Get the current gear of the vehicle as a whole number.
      Returns:
      the current gear of the vehicle.

    • increaseSpeed

      ManualTransmission increaseSpeed()
      Increase the speed by a fixed amount without changing gears and return the resulting transmission object. If the speed cannot be increased, then it should return an object with the same speed as before. The speed change amount is up to the implementation and is not an argument of this method.
      Returns:
      ManualTransmission object with updated or previous speed.

    • decreaseSpeed

      ManualTransmission decreaseSpeed()
      Decrease the speed by a fixed amount without changing gears and return the resulting transmission object. If the speed cannot be decreased, then it should return an object with the same speed as before. The speed change amount is up to the implementation and is not an argument of this method.
      Returns:
      ManualTransmission object with updated or previous speed.

    • increaseGear

      ManualTransmission increaseGear()
      Increase the gear by one without changing speed and return the resulting transmission object. If the gear cannot be increased, then it should return an object with the same gear as before.
      Returns:
      ManualTransmission object with updated or previous gear.

    • decreaseGear

      ManualTransmission decreaseGear()
      Decrease the gear by one without changing speed and return the resulting transmission object. If the gear cannot be decreased, then it should return an object with the same gear as before.
      Returns:
      ManualTransmission object with updated or previous gear.
